metadata.title: Infoblox-Get-IP-Space-Data
metadata.description: The playbook will fetch the data from 'IP Space' API and ingest it into custom table
prerequisites: 1. User must have a valid Infoblox API Key
postDeployment: Once deployment is complete, authorize connection.
1. Go to your logic app -> API connections -> Select connection resource
2. Go to General -> edit API connection
3. Provide Workspace Id and Workspace Key of Log Analytics Workspace where Table will be created

metadata.description: Please do not keep 'Playbook Name' parameter empty, else you will receive validation failure
Enter Base Url for your Infoblox instance. (e.g. https://csp.infoblox.com)
